# Takuya Ogiwara

| years2 = 2020      | clubs2 = → Albirex Niigata (loan)                 | caps2 = 24 | goals2 = 0
| years3 = 2021−2022 | clubs3 = → Kyoto Sanga (loan)                     | caps3 = 61 | goals3 = 4

}}
}}
is a Japanese professional footballer who plays as a left-back for  club, Urawa Red Diamonds.
Career
Ogiwara signed to Croatian club, GNK Dinamo Zagreb for mid 2023–24 season on loan.
In 2025, Ogiwara returned to J1 club, Urawa Red Diamonds for 2025 season.
